selectMethodDescription: Choose your preferred payment method for the {{plan}} plan.
paypalDescription: Pay securely with your PayPal account.
vnpayDescription: Pay securely with VNPay - Vietnam's leading payment gateway.
loginRequiredMessage: Please log in to proceed with payment.
title: PayPal Payment
redirectingToPayPal: You are being redirected to PayPal...
successMessage: Your payment was processed successfully. Your plan has been updated.
errorMessage: An error occurred during payment. Please try again.

loginRequired: You must be logged in to make a payment.

failedToProcessPayment: Failed to process payment result. Please contact support.
